text.div:
Pharmacy Order Types

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
M MedicationDefault value. Includes, but is not limited to, tables, capsules, powders, puffs, and other non-injected/non-infused products.added v2.5
O Other solution as medication ordersIncludes, but is not limited to, piggybacks and syringesadded v2.5
S IV Large Volume SolutionsIncludes, but is not limited to, TPNs, admixtures, solutions and drips.added v2.5

name: v2 Pharmacy Order Types
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0480 ( Pharmacy Order Types)

extension.valueString: Default value.  Includes, but is not limited to, tables, capsules, powders, puffs, and other non-injected/non-infused products.
Includes, but is not limited to, piggybacks and syringes
Includes, but is not limited to, TPNs, admixtures, solutions and drips.
